Location geocoder

This function geocodes a users vector of locations and returns a data_frame with the corresponding results

geocode(locations = NULL, search_types = c("neighborhood", "city", "county",
  "postal_code", "address", "building", "street", "school"), limit = 100,
  return_message = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

locations

vector of locations
search_types

vector of search parameters options include

  • neighborhood - includes neighborhood information

  • city - includes city information

  • county - includes county information

  • postal_code - includes zipcode

  • building - include building info

  • street - include street info

  • school - include school info
limit

numeric vector of results cannot exceed 100
return_message

if TRUE returns a message
...

extra parameters

Value

a data_frame

Examples

# NOT RUN {
geocode(locations = c("Palm Springs", "Bethesda", 10016), limit = 100)
# }
